title: Cargo Lint Plugin Configuration
description: Defines options for Cargo lint plugin execution. This plugin combines cargo clippy and cargo fmt --check.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

release.description: Whether to run cargo clippy in release mode. Default is false.

workspace.description: Whether to lint all packages in the workspace. Default is false.

warningsAsErrors.description: Whether to treat clippy warnings as errors (uses -D warnings). Default is false.

skipFmt.description: Whether to skip the cargo fmt --check step. Default is false.

skipClippy.description: Whether to skip the cargo clippy step. Default is false.
